item.title: Report E-2024070455
item.description:
Report E-2024070455

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-16
  • City: STURTEVANT
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately two (2) ounces of material released from one (1) 55-gallon poly drum due to a loose cap. The cap on the 55-gallon poly drum was hand tightened and shipped on to the consignee. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and cleanup debris was containerized into one (1) 25-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
